FuncDef:
The rip input command enables an interface to receive RIP packets.
The undo rip input command disables an interface from receiving RIP packets. The rip input command enables an interface to receive RIP packets. The undo rip input command disables an interface from receiving RIP packets. By default, an interface is enabled to receive RIP packets.

ExtraInfo: When a device running RIP is connected to a network running other routing protocols, you can run the rip input command on the interface that connects the device to the network to prevent the interface from receiving useless packets from the network.
